controls.caption: Fill alpha
controls.name: fillAlphaWithMaxValue
controls.description:
This flag is important when the number of channels in image "input_K" (K>1) is less than the number of channels in image "input_1".
If the flag is set, and the number of "input_1" channels â‰¥4 and is greater than the number of "input_K" channels, then the 4th "input_K" channel (alpha) and all subsequent "extra" channels will be supposed to be filled with the maximal possible value. For the alpha-channel, this means "full opacity".
If the flag is not set, all "extra" "input_K" channels will be supposed to be copies of the first "input_K" channel.
